name: unified_receipt.Latest_receipt_info
desc: An object that contains information about the latest in-app subscription transaction.

items.name: app_account_token
items.desc: The appAccountToken associated with this transaction. This field is only present if your app supplied an appAccountToken(_:) or provided a UUID for the applicationUsername property when the user made the purchase.

items.name: cancellation_date
items.desc: The time the App Store refunded a transaction or revoked it from family sharing, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601. This field is present only for refunded or revoked transactions.

items.name: cancellation_date_ms
items.desc: The time the App Store refunded a transaction or revoked it from family sharing, in UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. This field is present only for refunded or revoked transactions. Use this time format for processing dates. For more information, see cancellation_date_ms.

items.name: cancellation_date_pst
items.desc: The time the App Store refunded a transaction or revoked it from family sharing, in Pacific Standard Time. This field is present only for refunded or revoked transactions.

items.name: cancellation_reason
items.desc: The reason for a refunded or revoked transaction. A value of 1 indicates that the customer canceled their transaction due to an actual or perceived issue within your app. A value of 0 indicates that the transaction was canceled for another reason, for example, if the customer made the purchase accidentally.

items.name: expires_date
items.desc: The time a subscription expires or when it will renew, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601.

items.name: expires_date_ms
items.desc: The time when a subscription expires or when it will renew, in UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. Use this time format for processing dates. For more information, see expires_date_ms.

items.name: expires_date_pst
items.desc: The time when a subscription expires or when it will renew, in Pacific Standard Time.

items.name: in_app_ownership_type
items.desc: A value that indicates whether the user is the purchaser of the product or is a family member with access to the product through Family Sharing. See in_app_ownership_type for more information.

items.name: is_in_intro_offer_period
items.desc: An indicator of whether an auto-renewable subscription is in the introductory price period. For more information, see is_in_intro_offer_period.

items.name: is_trial_period
items.desc: An indicator of whether a subscription is in the free trial period. For more information, see is_trial_period.

items.name: is_upgraded
items.desc: An indicator that the system canceled a subscription because the user upgraded. This field is only present for subscription upgrade transactions.

items.name: offer_code_ref_name
items.desc: The reference name of a subscription offer you configured in App Store Connect. This field is present when a customer redeemed a subscription offer code. For more information, see offer_code_ref_name.

items.name: original_purchase_date
items.desc: The time of the original app purchase, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601 standard.

items.name: original_purchase_date_ms
items.desc: The time of the original app purchase, in UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. Use this time format for processing dates. This value indicates the date of the subscription’s initial purchase. The original purchase date applies to all product types and remains the same in all transactions for the same product ID. This value corresponds to the original transaction’s transactionDate property in StoreKit.

items.name: original_purchase_date_pst
items.desc: The time of the original app purchase, in Pacific Standard Time.

items.name: original_transaction_id
items.desc: The transaction identifier of the original purchase. For more information, see original_transaction_id.

items.name: promotional_offer_id
items.desc: The identifier of the subscription offer redeemed by the user. For more information, see promotional_offer_id.

items.name: product_id
items.desc: The unique identifier of the product purchased. You provide this value when creating the product in App Store Connect, and it corresponds to the productIdentifier property of the SKPayment object stored in the transaction’s payment property.

items.name: purchase_date
items.desc: The time when the App Store charged the user’s account for a subscription purchase or renewal after a lapse, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601 standard.

items.name: purchase_date_ms
items.desc: The time when the App Store charged the user’s account for a subscription purchase or renewal after a lapse, in the UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. Use this time format for processing dates.

items.name: purchase_date_pst
items.desc: The time when the App Store charged the user’s account for a subscription purchase or renewal after a lapse, in Pacific Standard Time.

items.name: quantity
items.desc: The number of consumable products purchased. This value corresponds to the quantity property of the SKPayment object stored in the transaction’s payment property. The value is usually 1 unless modified with a mutable payment. The maximum value is 10.

items.name: subscription_group_identifier
items.desc: The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs. The value for this field is identical to the subscriptionGroupIdentifier property in SKProduct.

items.name: transaction_id
items.desc: A unique identifier for a transaction such as a purchase, restore, or renewal. For more information, see transaction_id.

items.name: web_order_line_item_id
items.desc: A unique identifier for purchase events across devices, including subscription-renewal events. This value is the primary key to identify subscription purchases.
